answers.answer: I would definitely consult your doctor right away. They will ptobably want to check you out. Feel better soon.

Yep i agree.... you really need to get checked out as that can be signs that your blood pressure may be getting too high(preeclampsia) and you need to rule this out... it could easily be just a side effect of the pregnancy in general but its extremely important to get check jsut in case....

Call your doctor. Like Lesley said those could be signs of preaclampsia which if not looked after can be very bad and lead to a lot of complications. Not to scare you but my sister almost died from it with her first child. So please be on the safe side and call your doctor

Honestly it sounds like pre-eclampsia o had it with my first and that's exactly how I felt. I think I'm developing it a little with this one as I'm feeling this way as we speak. Its extremely high blood pressure basically. I'm also 33 weeks.
I almost died from.it with my first as well. I was put on bed rest but didn't listen and went to work anyway cause we needed the.money

question: hi am 33 weeks pregnant and for the last 2 days have had a bad headache that hasn't went away and a bit of spotty vision, back pain, very breathless, hands and feet and face swollen and just don't feel very well in myself
title: 33 wks
